invention-title: End pole plate and electrolytic bath

abstract.p: The invention relates to the field of electrolytic hydrogen production, and provides an end polar plate and an electrolytic bath, the end polar plate comprises a polar plate frame with an integrated structure, and the polar plate frame comprises a first concave part; the plurality of conductive plates are positioned in the first sunken part and are distributed at intervals along the length direction of the polar plate frame; the disc box of an integrated structure is buckled in the first sunken part and is in contact with the plurality of conductive plates; the separation box is positioned on one side, far away from the current-conducting plate, of the disc box; the plurality of supporting pieces are positioned on one side, far away from the conductive plate, of the disc box and are distributed at intervals along the length direction of the polar plate frame; the liquid inlet pipe assembly and the air outlet assembly are arranged at the two opposite ends of the polar plate frame respectively, and the air outlet assembly and the separation box are located at the same end of the polar plate frame. According to the end polar plate, modular design and assembly are achieved, the polar plate frame, the disc box and the separation box are all integrally-formed parts, precision is high, strength is large, the welding amount is small, welding points are reduced, welding deformation is reduced, the leakage risk is reduced, incoming material detection and later operation and maintenance are facilitated, and the total cost is reduced.

本发明涉及电解制氢领域，提供一种端极板及电解槽，包括：一体式结构的极板框架，包括第一凹陷部；多个导电板，位于第一凹陷部内，且沿极板框架长度方向间隔分布；一体式结构的盘盒，扣合于第一凹陷部内，且与多个导电板接触；一体式结构的分离盒，位于盘盒远离导电板的一侧；多个支撑件，位于盘盒远离导电板的一侧，且沿极板框架长度方向间隔分布；进液管组件和出气口组件，分别设置于极板框架相对的两端，出气口组件和分离盒位于极板框架的同一端。本实施例的端极板实现模块化设计与组装，极板框架、盘盒、分离盒均为一体成型件，精度高，强度大，焊接量小，减少焊接点，减小焊接变形，降低泄漏风险，方便来料检测和后期运维，减少总体成本。
